PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_CableSegmentTypeWirePairSegment
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties of wire pair segments. This property set is applicable to a type or occurence of IfcCableSegment with predefined type WIREPAIRSEGMENT.

PropertyDef.Name: CharacteristicImpedance
PropertyDef.Definition: A quantity defined for a mode of propagation at a given frequency in a specific uniform transmission line or uniform waveguide by one of the three following relations: Z1 = S/ |I|2 Z2 = |U|2 / S Z3 = U / I where Z is the complex characteristic impedance, S the complex power and U and I are the values, usually complex, respectively of a voltage and a current conventionally defined for each type of mode by analogy with transmission line equations.

PropertyDef.Name: ConductorDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the conductor diameter. It is only used for twisted and untwisted wire pair.

PropertyDef.Name: CoreConductorDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the core conductor diameter. It is only used for coaxial wire pair.

PropertyDef.Name: JacketColour
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the colour of the cable or fitting jacket.

PropertyDef.Name: ShieldConductorDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the shielded conductor diameter. It is only used for coaxial wire pair.

PropertyDef.Name: WirePairType
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the type of wire pair, i.e., twisted, untwisted or coaxial pair.
